mapper.insert: insert into insured_persons(insured_person_name_kanji, insured_person_name_kana, insured_person_birth_date, insured_person_sex) values (#{insured_person_name_kanji}, #{insured_person_name_kana}, #{insured_person_birth_date}, #{insured_person_sex})
mapper.select: select max(contract_id) from contracts where insured_person_id =#{insured_person_id}
mapper.insert: insert into contracts(insured_person_id, contract_id, contract_history_id, contract_start_date, contract_end_date, contract_end_reason, contract_maturity_date, security_type, entry_age, payment_method, insurance_money, premium, premium_payment_term, contract_term, payment_expiration_age) values (#{insured_person_id}, #{contract_id}, #{contract_history_id}, #{contract_start_date}, #{contract_end_date}, #{contract_end_reason}, #{contract_maturity_date}, #{security_type}, #{entry_age}, #{payment_method}, #{insurance_money}, #{premium}, #{premium_payment_term}, #{contract_term}, #{payment_expiration_age})
